# The `MCLabel` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instances of this class represent a label name in the MC file, and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mclabel">MCLabel</a> are created and uniqued by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> class. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Instances of this class represent a label name in the MC file, and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mclabel">MCLabel</a> are created and uniqued by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> class.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mclabel">MCLabel</a> should only be constructed for valid instances in the object file.

Definition at line 23 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mclabel-h">MCLabel.h</a>.
